definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be grieved (NH id; Aram. [[עֲגַם]], and 9gm (in Lexx.) id; cf. perh. also As. agâmu, be vexed Dl:HWB 16 (rare; cited under [[אגם]]));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[עָֽגְמָה נַפְשַׁי]] …[[אִם־לאׁ ]] [[לָאֶבְיוֹן]] Job 30:25 was not my soul grieved for the poor ? (‖[[בָּכִיתִי]]).
